basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Humberto Pineda, and I go by Bert. I strive for excellence from the get go. I want to be the best at what I do. I'm coachable and a fast learner. I've worked in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I strive for perfection, and I like to mentor other when I have a good grasp on what I do. Teamwork makes the dream work!

projects.title: Witty Mad Libs
projects.description: The most expanded application I've had opportunity to work with. My code was reviewed by awesome instructor and her assisntant. The application handles a game of mad libs and battlefront mased together. I learned how to cooperate with a team, software developement style.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for future study subject. I would like to learn about photography applications that optimize images with popular algorithms. I want to enter my own images taken on my travels. Wish me luck!

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: I had to develop code to display cute animal pictures! Anyone can click on their favorites, sort them, and get a quick look at individual ones should they choose. This was also my first project in React. I've learned a lot!
